prompt:
Style: Delicate watercolor with soft washes and fine linework.
Muted palette: dusty lavenders, soft violet, warm grays, pale coral accents.
Vignette compositions fading gently to white.
Diffused lighting, intimate and quiet.

Generate a full body character portrait. The character's face and appearance must match the reference headshot exactly.

Physical appearance: 5'7", average build with some muscle from cargo work, light brown skin, black hair (kept short for practicality, usually messy), dark brown eyes, oval face with a slightly upturned nose. Appears early-to-mid 20s. Hands have calluses from handling freight. Usually wears standard-issue cargo crew jumpsuit in navy blue with company patches.

Outfit and pose: Young woman in her mid-20s with a relaxed, open expression. Average height, average build with visible muscle definition in her forearms and shoulders from physical labor—sturdy and capable without being bulky. Standard-issue navy blue cargo jumpsuit, utilitarian and well-worn: the fabric faded at the knees and elbows, corporate patches on the shoulders bleached from repeated washing, sleeves pushed up past the elbows revealing tanned forearms. Wide utility belt at the waist with empty tool clips and small pouches. Thick-soled work boots, scuffed and practical, laced tight. Standing with weight shifted forward onto the balls of her feet, one hand resting on her belt, the other slightly raised as if about to gesture or reach for something. Her posture is alert and restless—someone who finds it hard to stay completely still.

Framing: Full body, standing in a relaxed natural pose, head turned slightly to the right.
Background: Plain, neutral gradient - do not include any environment or setting.

Display the name "Kira Voss" as text at the bottom of the image.

references.prompt:
Style: Delicate watercolor with soft washes and fine linework.
Muted palette: dusty lavenders, soft violet, warm grays, pale coral accents.
Vignette compositions fading gently to white.
Diffused lighting, intimate and quiet.

Generate a character portrait headshot (shoulders up) against a plain neutral background.

Physical appearance: 5'7", average build with some muscle from cargo work, light brown skin, black hair (kept short for practicality, usually messy), dark brown eyes, oval face with a slightly upturned nose. Appears early-to-mid 20s. Hands have calluses from handling freight. Usually wears standard-issue cargo crew jumpsuit in navy blue with company patches.

Clothing and expression: A woman in her early-to-mid 20s with light brown skin and an oval face. Black hair kept short and practical, currently messy and slightly tousled. Dark brown eyes with an alert, curious quality. Slightly upturned nose, giving her face a friendly openness. Neutral, relaxed expression with a hint of attentiveness. Navy blue cargo jumpsuit with a sturdy utilitarian collar, faded corporate patches visible on both shoulders, zipper pulled up to mid-chest.

Framing: Head and shoulders, centered, looking slightly to the right.
Background: Plain, neutral gradient - do not include any environment or setting.

Display the name "Kira Voss" as text at the bottom of the image.
